name: Fantasy Forever Revisions
description:
Three friends part ways to pursue their futures. Four years later a mysterious event reunites them for the sake of protecting their home. But are the threads of the friendship still intact or has the cruel hand of time pulled them apart? A threat that echoes a war from the past will put their friendship to the ultimate test

This is the first RPG Maker game I've ever completed. It contains a full voice cast to help bring the story to life. Heavily inspired by the original Final Fantasy, Tales of Symphonia, Golden Sun, and many other games of my youth.

Tip  - Play around with the Options to adjust the SE and BGM for the best experience with the voice acting.
